mapper.insert: insert into `userinfo` (id,version, bitState, realName,idNumber, phoneNumber, incomeGrade_id,email,authScore,realAuthId, marriage_id, kidCount_id, educationBackground_id,houseCondition_id,standbyone,standbytwo,standbythree) values (#{id},0, #{bitState,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeGrade.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{email},#{authScore},#{realAuthId}, #{marriage.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{kidCount.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{educationBackground.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{houseCondition.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{standbyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{standbytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{standbythree,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{standbyfour,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update `userinfo` set version = version+1, bitState = #{bitState,jdbcType=BIGINT}, realName = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idNumber = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realAuthId = #{realAuthId}, authScore = #{authScore}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, incomeGrade_id = #{incomeGrade.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, marriage_id = #{marriage.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, kidCount_id = #{kidCount.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, educationBackground_id = #{educationBackground.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, houseCondition_id = #{houseCondition.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, standbyone = #{standbyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standbytwo = #{standbyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standbythree = #{standbytwo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, standbyfour = #{standbythree,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND version = #{version}
mapper.sql: id, version, bitState, realName, idNumber, phoneNumber, incomeGrade_id, marriage_id,email,authScore,realAuthId, kidCount_id, educationBackground_id, houseCondition_id,standbyone,standbytwo,standbythree,standbyfour
